content: अश्मंतकः --कं {@--1@} A fire-place. {@--2@} The shade for a lamp (दीपाधार). {@--3@} A kind of grass. --कः <ab>N.</ab> of several trees:--({%a%}) अम्लोटक; its leaf; <ls>Māl. 9. 7</ls>; ({%b%}) <ab>N.</ab> of a tree कोविदारक; ({%c%}) <ab>N.</ab> of a plant from the fibres of which a Brāhmaṇa's girdle may be made.

अश्मंतकः --कं {@--1@} A fire-place. {@--2@} The shade for a lamp (दीपाधार). {@--3@} A kind of grass. --कः <ab>N.</ab> of several trees:--({%a%}) अम्लोटक; its leaf; <ls>Māl. 9. 7</ls>; ({%b%}) <ab>N.</ab> of a tree कोविदारक; ({%c%}) <ab>N.</ab> of a plant from the fibres of which a Brāhmaṇa's girdle may be made.
